.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkCopyDescriptorSet-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_COPY_DESCRIPTOR_SET
* [[VUID-VkCopyDescriptorSet-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkCopyDescriptorSet-srcSet-parameter]] pname:srcSet must: be a valid sname:VkDescriptorSet handle
* [[VUID-VkCopyDescriptorSet-dstSet-parameter]] pname:dstSet must: be a valid sname:VkDescriptorSet handle
* [[VUID-VkCopyDescriptorSet-commonparent]] Both of pname:dstSet, and pname:srcSet must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from the same sname:VkDevice
****
